summary: Braith getting a little too mouthy? Delphine acting like a jerk? Now you can brawl with anyone, anytime, anywhere!
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]r7n382ecUEQ[/youtube][/center]

[color=#ffca0d][b][u]DESCRIPTION[/u][/b][/color]

A simple mod that allows the player to initiate brawls with any NPC that might be getting on their nerves. Simply enter dialogue, select the appropriate option, and prepare to engage in fisticuffs!

[b]NOTE:[/b] Don\'t forget to talk to your opponent after you beat them down, otherwise the brawl won\'t end.

This mod was made in response to a request by StuartSmiles, and is a Nexus exclusive.

If you enjoy this mod, please [b]endorse[/b] it, and consider leaving a comment! I always like to hear feedback!

And don\'t forget to try out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19348/]Atvir Dres: The Last Prince of Tear[/url], one of the most complex voiced companions currently available for Skyrim! (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19348/)


[color=#ffca0d][b][u]CHANGELOG[/u][/b][/color]

1.1
-Added a short, post-brawl dialogue, which ends the \"brawl\" quest and clears the opponent/spectator aliases. [b]You are advised to always speak to your opponent after a match.[/b]
-Added unique challenges for some of Skyrim\'s most annoying NPCs. I\'ll let you find them yourself.


[color=#ffca0d][b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b][/color]

extract the files into:
...\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

-Open the Skyrim launcher
-Click on data files
-Check the box for \"JanusForbeare\'s Fighting Words.esp\"

OR

-Download with Nexus Mod Manager
-In NMM \"Mods\" window, find \"JanusForbeare\'s Fighting Words.esp\", highlight it, and click on \"Activate mod\" at left
author: JanusForbeare
